Headline: China surrounds Taiwan in military exercise against independence
Description: China has launched massive military exercises surrounding Taiwan in response to the island refusing to follow the rule of the Communist Party.

Headline: Chinese University of Michigan students charged after allegedly spying on military base
Description: Five former University of Michigan students have been charged after they allegedly covered up spying on a National Guard training center in Michigan for China.

Headline: Trump: We've been 'screwed' by Mexico, China, European Union | Fox News Video
Description: Former President Trump details his foreign policy and trade policies on ‘Sunday Morning Futures.’

Headline: China | Fox News
Description: The People’s Republic of China is the world’s most populous country, with a population of around 1.4billion. One of the world’s earliest civilizations, its political system was based on dynasties, eventually ending in 1912. In 1949, the Communist Party established the PRC. Since the introduction of economic reforms in 1978, China’s economy has been one of the world’s fastest-growing. It is a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council.

Headline: JD Vance warns of consequences for America if we continue to rely on 'Chinese slave labor'
Description: Sen. JD Vance sounded the alarm on U.S. manufacturing on Sunday, telling Fox News that America has relied too long on Chinese "slave labor."

Headline: Navy prepares for China conflict with newly announced strategy
Description: The United States Navy released its "Navigation Plan for America’s Warfighting Navy" on Thursday, outlining how the U.S. will meet the growing threat of Chinese military aggression against Taiwan by 2027.

Headline: Donald Trump: We've been 'screwed' on trade by Mexico, China, European Union
Description: Former President Trump proposes a re-negotiation of the U.S.–Mexico–Canada Agreement while claiming America has been "screwed" by trade partners over the past four years on "Sunday Morning Futures."

Headline: China launches military drills surrounding Taiwan | Fox News Video
Description: Chinese state TV broadcast captures purported military activity surrounding Taiwan. (Credit: Reuters)

Headline: Taiwan official warns China, Russia, Iran 'working together'
Description: Taiwan's new representative in the U.S. is warning about the alliance among China, Russia, Iran and North Korea.

Headline: Walz forced to correct record on whether he was in China for the Tiananmen Square protests
Description: Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz, the Democratic vice presidential nominee, had to answer questions about his controversial travel to China and misstatements about those trips during the debate.

Description: China has launched massive military exercises surrounding Taiwan in response to the island refusing to follow the rule of the Communist Party.

Headline: Chinese University of Michigan students charged after allegedly spying on military base
Description: Five former University of Michigan students have been charged after they allegedly covered up spying on a National Guard training center in Michigan for China.

Headline: Taiwan official warns China, Russia, Iran 'working together'
Description: Taiwan's new representative in the U.S. is warning about the alliance among China, Russia, Iran and North Korea.

Headline: Walz forced to correct record on whether he was in China for the Tiananmen Square protests
Description: Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz, the Democratic vice presidential nominee, had to answer questions about his controversial travel to China and misstatements about those trips during the debate.

Headline: Mark Cuban defends NBA's China partnership despite opposing 'Chinese and all human rights violations'
Description: Dallas Mavericks minority owner Mark Cuban doubled down on his public approval for the NBA's partnership with China after previously defending and embracing it.

Headline: Tim Walz said he went to China 'dozens' of times, now his campaign says its 'closer to 15'
Description: Vice presidential candidate Gov. Tim Walz exaggerated claims about how many times he traveled to China, telling people he spent much more time there than in actuality.

Headline: China launches intercontinental ballistic missile into Pacific hours after Biden's UN address
Description: China launched a missile into the Pacific Ocean Wednesday, not long after President Biden mentioned a need for security in East Asia during a U.N. address.

Headline: Taiwanese people ready to fight as China ramps up aggression, ambassador says
Description: Taiwan's representative to the U.S., Alexander Yui, is vowing that the island's people are ready to fight if China invades the island.

Headline: US-China trade tensions escalate over surging production of electric vehicles
Description: China produces more EVs and green tech than it can sell domestically, and the low prices caused by this surplus supply make the market difficult for American manufacturers.

Headline: US-China space race for moon mining heats up
Description: During the Apollo missions, scientists discovered rare earth elements in its lunar samples. China and the U.S. are now exploring space mining on the moon's surface.

Headline: House China Committee: Cargo cranes give China a tool to disrupt trade, military mobilization at US ports
Description: House China Committee Chair Mike Gallagher told Fox News Digital that China has the potential to use cargo cranes as a “tool" to “disrupt American trade and military mobilization.

Headline: Sources believe coronavirus outbreak originated in Wuhan lab as part of China's efforts to compete with US
Description: There is increasing confidence that COVID-19 likely originated in a Wuhan laboratory not as a bioweapon, but as part of China's effort to demonstrate that its efforts to identify and combat viruses are equal to or greater than the capabilities of the United States, multiple sources who have been briefed on the details of early actions by China's government and seen relevant materials tell Fox News.

Headline: Chinese shipbuilding capacity over 200 times greater than US, Navy intelligence says
Description: China's naval fleet, already larger than the U.S. Navy, is expected to continue producing ships at a faster rate, prompting warnings of dire consequences for U.S. security.

Headline: China exerts new restrictions on exports of minerals critical to US weapons making
Description: China slapped new export controls on a batch of minerals, including antimony, that are key to the U.S. defense industry in a move that could send prices in the defense sector soaring.

Description: China has launched massive military exercises surrounding Taiwan in response to the island refusing to follow the rule of the Communist Party.

Description: China slapped new export controls on a batch of minerals, including antimony, that are key to the U.S. defense industry in a move that could send prices in the defense sector soaring.

Headline: Biden DOJ ending national security initiative aimed at countering China amid complaints about bias
Description: The Department of Justice announced Wednesday that it is ending its "China Initiative" program that was aimed at preventing spying by the Chinese Communist Party, and launching a new, "broader approach."

Headline: House Oversight investigating Walz over 'longstanding connections' to China
Description: House Oversight Committee Chairman James Comer, R-Ky., sent a letter to FBI Director Christopher Wray, notifying the bureau of the committee’s investigation into Kamala Harris’ running mate, Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz.

Headline: Zelenskyy questions China's 'true interest' behind plan to end Russia’s war
Description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy went after China, Iran and North Korea in an unusually assertive address to the UNGA for their backing of Russian President Vladimir Putin with direct or indirect aid.

Headline: China launches lunar probe to take samples from far side of the moon
Description: China's advancing space exploration program has launched a new lunar probe to explore the far side of the moon. China has its own space station and conceptual plans for a moon base.

Headline: Turkish foreign minister urges China to protect rights of Muslim Uyghurs
Description: Turkey's foreign minister urged Chinese authorities to protect the cultural rights of minority Muslim Uyghurs in response to accusations of human rights violations.

Headline: FBI Director Wray says bureau stopped second Chinese hacking group
Description: FBI Director Christopher Wray said the agency's Cyber Action Team disrupted a second Chinese hacking group that had infiltrated thousands of devices.

Headline: Hungary’s Orban interrupted, accused of 'selling out' country to Russia, China during EU news conference
Description: Hungary's Prime Minister Viktor Orban was interrupted at a news conference by an activist and municipal councilor from the opposition Democratic Coalition party.

Headline: Hundreds of millions of US research dollars may have aided Chinese military technology, GOP-led report says
Description: House Republicans argue in a new congressional report that hundreds of millions of dollars in federal research funding over the last decade has contributed to China’s technological advancements.

Headline: Japan and Philippines sign defense agreement prompted by concerns over China
Description: Japan and the Philippines have signed a defense pact allowing Japanese forces to deploy in the Southeast Asian country for joint military exercises, officials say.

Headline: How a Chinese attack on Taiwan could lead to a direct war between the US and Beijing
Description: House lawmakers visiting Taiwan this week are warning that a Chinese invasion of the island could likely lead to a direct conflict between the U.S. and Beijing.

Headline: China's military targets American troops, veterans for exploitation campaign, general says
Description: China is targeting U.S. military troops and veterans as part of an exploitation campaign to "fill gaps" in its military capabilities, a top U.S. general says.

Headline: Taiwan watches Ukraine for lessons on possible war with China
Description: Taiwan is taking lessons on both strategy and how to handle its allies from Ukraine as it continues to fight a Russian invasion.

Headline: Chinese military company's machinery in use at nation's top secret research lab, Oversight Committee says
Description: The House Oversight Committee is aware of a machine operated by a Chinese military company that is in use at the nation’s most top secret military base.

Headline: NBA Commissioner Adam Silver says league will play games in China 'at some point' again
Description: NBA Commissioner Adam Silver said Thursday in New York he believes the league's relationship with China has mended to the point games will be played there again.

Headline: New report sounds alarm on China's role in destroying US families with deadly drug: 'Destabilizing crisis'
Description: A new report by the Heritage Foundation is shining a light on China's role in the deadly fentanyl crisis that has been killing Americans for years.

Headline: Trump unleashes on Harris, talking immigration, China in exclusive 'Life, Liberty & Levin' interview
Description: In an exclusive interview with Fox News' Mark Levin, on 'Life, Liberty & Levin,' Former President Trump said that Kamala Harris is a "radical left Marxist," and discussed his domestic and foreign relations plans.

Headline: Walz's honeymoon with China gets fresh scrutiny as Harris camp blasts 'lying' critics
Description: Tim Walz, Vice President Kamala Harris' running mate, is facing scrutiny over previous visits and alleged pro-China comments he has made. The Harris campaign disputes this.

Headline: Former astronaut Sen. Mark Kelly started spy balloon company funded by China
Description: Arizona Sen. Mark Kelly was an astronaut before going into politics, but also started a balloon company with a vision of space tourism, before evolved into offering surveillance.

Headline: Is the ICC corrupted by China?
Description: The International Criminal Court (ICC) rejected to open an investigation into the mounting allegations of genocide against the Uighur Muslims in China, meaning the Chinese Communist Party (CCP) has a free hand to continue what it deems "re-education" camps – for now.

Headline: Republicans propose bill that would double tariffs on Chinese imports and end favored trade status
Description: A group of Republican senators is unveiling a new bill that would cease all permanent normal trade relations with China and double the tariffs on Chinese Communist Party (CCP) goods.

Description: China has launched massive military exercises surrounding Taiwan in response to the island refusing to follow the rule of the Communist Party.

Headline: Walz's honeymoon with China gets fresh scrutiny as Harris camp blasts 'lying' critics
Description: Tim Walz, Vice President Kamala Harris' running mate, is facing scrutiny over previous visits and alleged pro-China comments he has made. The Harris campaign disputes this.

Headline: Former astronaut Sen. Mark Kelly started spy balloon company funded by China
Description: Arizona Sen. Mark Kelly was an astronaut before going into politics, but also started a balloon company with a vision of space tourism, before evolved into offering surveillance.

Headline: Is the ICC corrupted by China?
Description: The International Criminal Court (ICC) rejected to open an investigation into the mounting allegations of genocide against the Uighur Muslims in China, meaning the Chinese Communist Party (CCP) has a free hand to continue what it deems "re-education" camps – for now.

Headline: Republicans propose bill that would double tariffs on Chinese imports and end favored trade status
Description: A group of Republican senators is unveiling a new bill that would cease all permanent normal trade relations with China and double the tariffs on Chinese Communist Party (CCP) goods.

Headline: This US bomber is why China suddenly wants to talk about nukes and AI
Description: It’s the only U.S. Air Force combat plane with the range and stealth to chase China’s mobile missiles and carry the deep penetrating weapons to hit underground bunkers.

Headline: Comer subpoenas DHS for records relating to Walz's alleged ties to Chinese Communist Party
Description: A whistleblower notified Comer of a non-classified DHS group chat, intelligence reports discussing Walz’s alleged connections to the CCP

Headline: Investigator reveals China tried to smuggle drones to Libya disguised as COVID aid
Description: China attempted to send $1 billion worth of drones disguised as COVID-19 aid to a Libyan warlord through the assistance of corrupt U.N. officials, according to a Canadian government investigator.

Headline: Putin to visit China this week to meet with Xi, Chinese Foreign Ministry says
Description: Russian President Vladimir Putin is set to visit China for two days, strengthening the alliance between the two authoritarian powers against the Western order led by the U.S.

Headline: Philippines deploys new coast guard ship to Sabina Shoal, defying China's demands for withdrawal
Description: The Philippines is sending a new vessel to replace the coast guard ship Teresa Magbanua at Sabina Shoal in the South China Sea after the original ship returned to port.

Headline: China successfully lands spacecraft on far side of moon, state media says
Description: China successfully landed a spacecraft on the far side of the moon on Thursday, becoming the first country to ever land on the side of the moon that faces away from Earth, state news media said.

Headline: John Kerry comes up empty in China climate talks
Description: Special Presidential Envoy for Climate John Kerry and his Chinese counterparts failed to reach a climate agreement this week, they announced Wednesday.

Headline: GOP senators eye comprehensive China strategy to curb CCP influence
Description: Senate Republicans are pushing new measures to curb CCP influence across several fronts.

Headline: Russia, China hold biggest war games since Soviet era
Description: Russia and China in midst of the largest war games since the Soviet era with some 90,000 troops engaged in joint drills as the U.S. warns Beijing has provided Moscow with "substantial" war aid.

Headline: China protests U.S. Navy destroyer's passage through Taiwan Strait
Description: China on Tuesday protested the passage of a U.S. Navy destroyer through the Taiwan Strait, calling it a deliberate move to undermine stability in the region.

Headline: China surrounds Taiwan in military exercise against independence
Description: China has launched massive military exercises surrounding Taiwan in response to the island refusing to follow the rule of the Communist Party.

Headline: Chinese University of Michigan students charged after allegedly spying on military base
Description: Five former University of Michigan students have been charged after they allegedly covered up spying on a National Guard training center in Michigan for China.

Headline: Trump: We've been 'screwed' by Mexico, China, European Union | Fox News Video
Description: Former President Trump details his foreign policy and trade policies on ‘Sunday Morning Futures.’

Headline: China | Fox News
Description: The People’s Republic of China is the world’s most populous country, with a population of around 1.4billion. One of the world’s earliest civilizations, its political system was based on dynasties, eventually ending in 1912. In 1949, the Communist Party established the PRC. Since the introduction of economic reforms in 1978, China’s economy has been one of the world’s fastest-growing. It is a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council.

Headline: JD Vance warns of consequences for America if we continue to rely on 'Chinese slave labor'
Description: Sen. JD Vance sounded the alarm on U.S. manufacturing on Sunday, telling Fox News that America has relied too long on Chinese "slave labor."

Headline: Navy prepares for China conflict with newly announced strategy
Description: The United States Navy released its "Navigation Plan for America’s Warfighting Navy" on Thursday, outlining how the U.S. will meet the growing threat of Chinese military aggression against Taiwan by 2027.

Headline: Donald Trump: We've been 'screwed' on trade by Mexico, China, European Union
Description: Former President Trump proposes a re-negotiation of the U.S.–Mexico–Canada Agreement while claiming America has been "screwed" by trade partners over the past four years on "Sunday Morning Futures."

Headline: China launches military drills surrounding Taiwan | Fox News Video
Description: Chinese state TV broadcast captures purported military activity surrounding Taiwan. (Credit: Reuters)

Headline: Taiwan official warns China, Russia, Iran 'working together'
Description: Taiwan's new representative in the U.S. is warning about the alliance among China, Russia, Iran and North Korea.

Headline: Walz forced to correct record on whether he was in China for the Tiananmen Square protests
Description: Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz, the Democratic vice presidential nominee, had to answer questions about his controversial travel to China and misstatements about those trips during the debate.

Headline: Mark Cuban defends NBA's China partnership despite opposing 'Chinese and all human rights violations'
Description: Dallas Mavericks minority owner Mark Cuban doubled down on his public approval for the NBA's partnership with China after previously defending and embracing it.

Headline: Tim Walz said he went to China 'dozens' of times, now his campaign says its 'closer to 15'
Description: Vice presidential candidate Gov. Tim Walz exaggerated claims about how many times he traveled to China, telling people he spent much more time there than in actuality.

Headline: China launches intercontinental ballistic missile into Pacific hours after Biden's UN address
Description: China launched a missile into the Pacific Ocean Wednesday, not long after President Biden mentioned a need for security in East Asia during a U.N. address.

Headline: Taiwanese people ready to fight as China ramps up aggression, ambassador says
Description: Taiwan's representative to the U.S., Alexander Yui, is vowing that the island's people are ready to fight if China invades the island.

Headline: US-China trade tensions escalate over surging production of electric vehicles
Description: China produces more EVs and green tech than it can sell domestically, and the low prices caused by this surplus supply make the market difficult for American manufacturers.

Headline: US-China space race for moon mining heats up
Description: During the Apollo missions, scientists discovered rare earth elements in its lunar samples. China and the U.S. are now exploring space mining on the moon's surface.

Headline: House China Committee: Cargo cranes give China a tool to disrupt trade, military mobilization at US ports
Description: House China Committee Chair Mike Gallagher told Fox News Digital that China has the potential to use cargo cranes as a “tool" to “disrupt American trade and military mobilization.

Headline: Sources believe coronavirus outbreak originated in Wuhan lab as part of China's efforts to compete with US
Description: There is increasing confidence that COVID-19 likely originated in a Wuhan laboratory not as a bioweapon, but as part of China's effort to demonstrate that its efforts to identify and combat viruses are equal to or greater than the capabilities of the United States, multiple sources who have been briefed on the details of early actions by China's government and seen relevant materials tell Fox News.

Headline: Chinese shipbuilding capacity over 200 times greater than US, Navy intelligence says
Description: China's naval fleet, already larger than the U.S. Navy, is expected to continue producing ships at a faster rate, prompting warnings of dire consequences for U.S. security.

Headline: China exerts new restrictions on exports of minerals critical to US weapons making
Description: China slapped new export controls on a batch of minerals, including antimony, that are key to the U.S. defense industry in a move that could send prices in the defense sector soaring.

Headline: Biden DOJ ending national security initiative aimed at countering China amid complaints about bias
Description: The Department of Justice announced Wednesday that it is ending its "China Initiative" program that was aimed at preventing spying by the Chinese Communist Party, and launching a new, "broader approach."

Headline: House Oversight investigating Walz over 'longstanding connections' to China
Description: House Oversight Committee Chairman James Comer, R-Ky., sent a letter to FBI Director Christopher Wray, notifying the bureau of the committee’s investigation into Kamala Harris’ running mate, Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz.

Headline: Zelenskyy questions China's 'true interest' behind plan to end Russia’s war
Description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy went after China, Iran and North Korea in an unusually assertive address to the UNGA for their backing of Russian President Vladimir Putin with direct or indirect aid.

Headline: China launches lunar probe to take samples from far side of the moon
Description: China's advancing space exploration program has launched a new lunar probe to explore the far side of the moon. China has its own space station and conceptual plans for a moon base.

Headline: Turkish foreign minister urges China to protect rights of Muslim Uyghurs
Description: Turkey's foreign minister urged Chinese authorities to protect the cultural rights of minority Muslim Uyghurs in response to accusations of human rights violations.

Headline: FBI Director Wray says bureau stopped second Chinese hacking group
Description: FBI Director Christopher Wray said the agency's Cyber Action Team disrupted a second Chinese hacking group that had infiltrated thousands of devices.

Headline: Hungary’s Orban interrupted, accused of 'selling out' country to Russia, China during EU news conference
Description: Hungary's Prime Minister Viktor Orban was interrupted at a news conference by an activist and municipal councilor from the opposition Democratic Coalition party.

Headline: Hundreds of millions of US research dollars may have aided Chinese military technology, GOP-led report says
Description: House Republicans argue in a new congressional report that hundreds of millions of dollars in federal research funding over the last decade has contributed to China’s technological advancements.

Headline: Japan and Philippines sign defense agreement prompted by concerns over China
Description: Japan and the Philippines have signed a defense pact allowing Japanese forces to deploy in the Southeast Asian country for joint military exercises, officials say.

Headline: How a Chinese attack on Taiwan could lead to a direct war between the US and Beijing
Description: House lawmakers visiting Taiwan this week are warning that a Chinese invasion of the island could likely lead to a direct conflict between the U.S. and Beijing.

Headline: China's military targets American troops, veterans for exploitation campaign, general says
Description: China is targeting U.S. military troops and veterans as part of an exploitation campaign to "fill gaps" in its military capabilities, a top U.S. general says.

Headline: Taiwan watches Ukraine for lessons on possible war with China
Description: Taiwan is taking lessons on both strategy and how to handle its allies from Ukraine as it continues to fight a Russian invasion.

Headline: Chinese military company's machinery in use at nation's top secret research lab, Oversight Committee says
Description: The House Oversight Committee is aware of a machine operated by a Chinese military company that is in use at the nation’s most top secret military base.

Headline: NBA Commissioner Adam Silver says league will play games in China 'at some point' again
Description: NBA Commissioner Adam Silver said Thursday in New York he believes the league's relationship with China has mended to the point games will be played there again.

Headline: New report sounds alarm on China's role in destroying US families with deadly drug: 'Destabilizing crisis'
Description: A new report by the Heritage Foundation is shining a light on China's role in the deadly fentanyl crisis that has been killing Americans for years.

Description: In an exclusive interview with Fox News' Mark Levin, on 'Life, Liberty & Levin,' Former President Trump said that Kamala Harris is a "radical left Marxist," and discussed his domestic and foreign relations plans.

Description: Russian President Vladimir Putin is set to visit China for two days, strengthening the alliance between the two authoritarian powers against the Western order led by the U.S.

Headline: Philippines deploys new coast guard ship to Sabina Shoal, defying China's demands for withdrawal
Description: The Philippines is sending a new vessel to replace the coast guard ship Teresa Magbanua at Sabina Shoal in the South China Sea after the original ship returned to port.

Description: China successfully landed a spacecraft on the far side of the moon on Thursday, becoming the first country to ever land on the side of the moon that faces away from Earth, state news media said.

Description: Special Presidential Envoy for Climate John Kerry and his Chinese counterparts failed to reach a climate agreement this week, they announced Wednesday.

Headline: GOP senators eye comprehensive China strategy to curb CCP influence
Description: Senate Republicans are pushing new measures to curb CCP influence across several fronts.

Headline: Russia, China hold biggest war games since Soviet era
Description: Russia and China in midst of the largest war games since the Soviet era with some 90,000 troops engaged in joint drills as the U.S. warns Beijing has provided Moscow with "substantial" war aid.

Headline: China protests U.S. Navy destroyer's passage through Taiwan Strait
Description: China on Tuesday protested the passage of a U.S. Navy destroyer through the Taiwan Strait, calling it a deliberate move to undermine stability in the region.

Headline: China flies nuclear-capable bomber in South China Sea after Trump Taiwan call, US officials say
Description: China flew a long-range nuclear-capable bomber outside China for the first time since President-elect Donald Trump spoke with the president of Taiwan, two US officials told Fox News. The dramatic show of force was meant to send a message to the new administration, according to the officials.

Headline: China launches investigation into suspected spy balloon flying over US, ministry says
Description: The Chinese government is looking into the suspected Chinese high-altitude spy balloon that was reported in United States airspace, flying over Montana on Thursday.

Headline: Biden admin confirms China spy base efforts in Cuba, calls it 'ongoing issue'
Description: A Biden administration official on Saturday confirmed that China is working on increasing its spying efforts, including bases, in Cuba -- and it preceded the administration.

Headline: China silent as Russia and North Korea forge new defense pact, raising regional power shift concerns
Description: China appears to be keeping its distance as Russia and North Korea move closer to each other with a new defense pact that could tilt the balance of power.

Headline: US, Japan and South Korea run military drills in disputed East China Sea
Description: While President Biden met with the leaders of Japan and the Philippines, the U.S. navy led drills with Japan and South Korea amid tensions between the allies and China and North Korea

Headline: Senate to vote on contentious Arctic ambassador nominee with deep ties to China and Russia
Description: When the Biden administration nominated Michael Sfraga to be special ambassador to the Arctic, he failed to disclose his deep history with Russia and China.

Headline: House tees up 'China Week' with floor votes aimed at combatting CCP espionage and economic advances
Description: The House is set to fast-track approval of a slew of China-related bills that aim to counter the U.S.’s growing foe beginning Monday.

Headline: Exclusive: China sends surface-to-air missiles to contested island in provocative move
Description: The Chinese military has deployed an advanced surface-to-air missile system to one of its contested islands in the South China Sea according to civilian satellite imagery exclusively obtained by Fox News, more evidence that China is increasingly "militarizing" its islands in the South China Sea and ramping up tensions in the region.

Headline: China's hesitation to discuss Russia-Ukraine war raises concerns of pro-Moscow stance
Description: China has displayed hesitance to engage in discussions about the Russia-Ukraine war, voicing reservations. The country has claimed to have a neutral stance.

Headline: China and the US are locked in a cold war. We must win it. Here's how we will
Description: China's leader Xi Jinping had grand plans to defeat the United States and there's no time to waste. We must confront the communist nation on the world stage. Here's our plan.
